value:
I will brook no harsh talk about my
sister. Patty is a decent and honest
person at heart.

My sister and I grew up in an
orphanage. That's why, all the money
I make, I'm giving to children in need.

I hope Patty is all right. Sometimes
she pushes herself too hard trying to
help out the orphanage.

Patty said I was out of my mind to
work for the empire, no matter the
money involved. And she was right.

I remember very little of my mother.
But I do know she was beautiful—and
had the kindest of hearts.

Hey there. I dropped in to pass along
this token of friendship from
$Nf.

I will never stop fighting for peace!
On this bow, I swear it!
Everything I do, I do for the orphans!

No, this won't do! I can't keep making
Patty act like a thief...
What's the job? I'll see it gets done.

I'm Febail—a mercenary, but not here
to do your dirty work. Ah...if you see
my sister, please let me know.

You haven't run into Patty of late,
have you? That girl... Always going off
somewhere.$k$pI thought learning our mother was a
noblewoman of Yngvi might temper
her attitude, but it seems not.$k$pThough in fairness, it didn't temper
mine either. I'm still fighting for the
children at the orphanage.$k$pFor me, this is not a war of allies and
enemies. It is about making a happier
world for the next generation.$k$pI'd like to think my mother would be
proud of what I've done—and what
I still have yet to accomplish.
Too much at stake.
I don't shrink from a challenge!
My arrow will tear you!
Too late to run.
I'm sorry, Patty...
Well met, summoner. I am Febail.
Hm? Did you...need me?
A mercenary I may be, but I draw the line at dirty work.
More fool I, to do the empire's bidding. It was wrong.
Mother was so beautiful, so kind...
Patty has changed, that's for certain.
I finally feel as though I've found my calling.
Right.
Lead on.
Here I go!
